SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry
public
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​SpecialEvents
public
SCSSdkClient.​Object.​SCSTelemetry.​SpecialEvents

Special Events the plugin deliver like onJob and JobFinished

Properties
OnJob
public bool OnJob { get; internal set }

Event flag that displays if a driver is doing a job

JobFinished
public bool JobFinished { get; internal set }

Event flag that displays (for some ticks) that a job was finished, doesn't matter how (cancelled, delivered, ...)

TrailerConnected
public bool TrailerConnected { get; internal set }

Event flag that displays if the game says there is a trailer that is connected with us (so attached, detached doesn't matter for this flag).  The event flag is true for:

  • Trailer is attached

  • Trailer is detached, but you're on a job and doesn't cancel it

  • Trailer is detached, but it is your trailer and doesn't bring it back

The event flag is false for:

  • You end/cancel a job and doesn't own the trailer

  • Bring your own trailer back, after it detached the flag should be false
